description: From dromo- (“course, speed”) +‎ -tropic (“affecting, changing”), from Ancient Greek δρόμος (drómos, “course, race”) +‎ τρόπος (trópos, “turn, direction, way”) +‎ -ικός (-ikós, “-ic”, adjectival suffix).

entries.meaning: (physiology) Affecting the conductivity of cardiac muscle, used of the influence of cardiac nerves.
